name: codex-equilibrium
description: Lightweight Hono-based Node.js service that balances multiple ChatGPT Codex OAuth accounts, persists tokens locally, and proxies /v1/* with SSE streaming.

scripts.dev: tsc --moduleResolution NodeNext --module NodeNext --target ES2020 && node dist/index.js
scripts.login: tsc --moduleResolution NodeNext --module NodeNext --target ES2020 && node dist/cli.js login
scripts.push: npm run build && npm publish --access public
